# Data Usage Notice

This extension uses data from a Google Sheets document that is fully controlled by the streamer. The data accessed is used solely to format and display information as part of the extension's functionality.

- **Data Collection**: This extension accesses data from a Google Sheets document provided by the streamer. No personal user data is collected by this extension.
- **Data Usage**: The information from Google Sheets is formatted and displayed within the extension for the benefit of viewers.
- **Streamer Control**: All data is managed and controlled by the streamer, and the extension does not collect or store any additional data from users.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact st3v1sh@gmail.com.
